title: TEST Flora Annual Fall Festival Dates Announced
full_story: The town council has confirmed the dates for this year's festival, featuring new local vendors.

title: TEST Louisville High School Basketball Update
full_story: The varsity team secures a home-court victory in the regional qualifiers.

title: TEST New Infrastructure Project on Main St
full_story: Construction begins next week to improve water drainage and sidewalk safety.

full_story: After renovations, the community center is now open for public bookings and youth sports.

title: TEST Sailor Springs Historical Society Meeting
full_story: Join us this Friday to discuss the preservation of local landmarks.
